name: Battlebounds
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Defend your base from enemies and destroy the enemy base.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to MOVE and your MOUSE BUTTON to aim and shoot.

+1 Damage Every Battlepoints: 10, 50, 100, 200.

This was supposedly submitted to another game jam GAME OFF 2019 https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2019. But I got busy for the Holidays.

Then I saw this Finally Finish Something jam and got motivated. Thanks!
